body:
## What's Changed
* Guava 27 & JDK 8 by @micheljung in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/367
* UnknownEvent add respondWith method by @stewue in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/365
* BugFix: DCC RESUME & Enhancement: Faster DCC SEND by @jenga201 in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/378
* DCC SEND & RECEIVE Updates by @jenga201 in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/379
* Somehow italic text was not filtered by removeFormatting() by @Cypherke in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/384
* Try to simplify some of the message delay code by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/386
* Improve concurrent access to DAO by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/387
* Add OPER success and failed events by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/389
* Don't log passwords by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/388
* Do not block in getMode() if it's not ready by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/391
* Added WhoEvent to be fired on generic WHO commands by @hoerup in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/392
* Bump guava from 28.2-jre to 29.0-jre by @dependabot in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/398
* Bump logback-classic from 1.1.3 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/399
* Add QuietListEvent and tests by @jeaye in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/400
* Add IRCv3 tags to other events by @jeaye in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/404
* 2022 Project Update by @TheLQ in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/407

## New Contributors
* @micheljung made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/367
* @stewue made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/365
* @jenga201 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/378
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/398
* @jeaye made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/400
* @TheLQ made their first contribution in https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/pull/407

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pircbotx/pircbotx/compare/2.2...v2.3
